tourBios.curYearHigh: Finished T20 at the PGA Professional Championship then birdied the first playoff hole to secure an invite to the PGA Championship at Whistling Straits...Was the only one of 20 PGA professionals to make the cut at the PGA Championship in August. Got to the weekend after opening 71-73. Was 78-71 (5-over) for his final 36 holes, good for a 71st-place finish among the 77 players who made the cut.

tourBios.otherVics: (1): 1998 New Jersey Open. 2010 New Jersey Open.
tourBios.curYearHigh: Finished T20 at the PGA Professional Championship then birdied the first playoff hole to secure an invite to the PGA Championship at Whistling Straits...Was the only one of 20 PGA professionals to make the cut at the PGA Championship in August. Got to the weekend after opening 71-73. Was 78-71 (5-over) for his final 36 holes, good for a 71st-place finish among the 77 players who made the cut.
tourBios.carHigh:
2012: Named the New Jersey PGA Player of the Year...Finished T15 at the PGA Professional Championship...Was one of four PGA professionals to compete in the U.S. Open at The Olympic Club. It was his U.S. Open debut...Made his third PGA Championship appearance and fourth major championship start overall. 

2011: Named the New Jersey PGA Player of the Year.

2010: Won the New Jersey Open via a three-hole aggregate playoff. 

2009: Qualified for the PGA Championship...Finished T13 at the PGA Professional Championship.

2000: Played in the PGA Championship...Finished T8 at the PGA Professional Championship...Member of the 2000 U.S. PGA Cup team.

1998: Won the New Jersey Open for the first time. 

Amateur: Was an NCAA Division III All-American at Montclair State University.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the PGA TOUR was 71st in 2015 at the PGA Championship.
